category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 11-2 (obligations)
contents: Article 11-2 (Obligations) A committee member, secretary, or person who held that position must comply with the following obligations. 1. Information or documents acquired in the course of committee activities cannot be arbitrarily published or distributed to others. 2. You must not disclose or steal secrets learned while performing committee duties. [This article was newly established on January 31, 2019]
